item.title: 'Joe vs. Carole' Introduces Carole Baskin's Daughter, Jamie Murdock
item.description: 'Joe vs. Carole' Introduces Carole Baskin's Daughter, Jamie MurdockBy Sara BelcherPublished March 4 2022, 8:03 p.m. ET Source: PeacockIt's been two years since we were first introduced to the saga of Joe Exotic and Carole Baskin in the Netflix Original Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness. But since the world can't seem to get enough of the pair's dramatic story, there's now a scripted series centered around them. Joe vs. Carole is a Peacock miniseries following the pair's feud, bringing in some new characters along with it — like Carole's daughter, Jamie Murdock.

item.title: Emmanuel Petit - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: French former soccer player most famous for scoring the final goal in France's win against Denmark in the 1998 FIFA World Cup Final. He also won multiple titles with Arsenal and Monaco. Before Fame He was signed by AS Monaco as an eighteen-year-old. Trivia He raised £34,000 for charity by shaving his hair in June 2011. Family Life He was married to actress Agathe de La Fontaine from 2000 to 2002.

item.title: If You've Been Thinking About Preordering 'Horizon Forbidden West,' Here's What You'll Get
item.description: What is the 'Horizon Forbidden West' preorder bonus? There are four different versions of the game for players to choose from that each have perks. Source: PlaystationThe PlayStation exclusive Horizon Zero Dawn was a best-seller when it came out on Feb. 28, 2017. It quickly sold millions of copies and became one of the best-selling games for the PlayStation 4. Of course, with all that success, there had to be a sequel — and almost five years later to the day, Horizon Forbidden West is scheduled to be released.

item.title: Casanova - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Brooklyn rapper known as Casanova who became popular for producing catchy street bangers such as his debut single "Don't Run." He is also known for his song "It Go Down When You Trappin," featuring Big BZ and Preston Waters. Before Fame He originally started releasing music on YouTube as early as 2013. Trivia He released his first studio album Behind These Scars in 2019.  Family Life He was born Caswell Senior and is of Panamanian and Jamaican descent.

item.title: Police React As Explosion Kills 15 Fuel Scoopers In Ondo
item.description: The Nigeria Police Force, Ogun State command, has reacted to the tragic death of a pregnant woman and fourteen others in a fuel tanker explosion in Ondo State on Sunday, July 23, 2023. Naija News reports that the tragic incident happened in Ore, a commercial community in the Odigbo Local Government Area of Ondo State. Reports had it that a fuel-laden tanker crashed in the area yesterday, and residents besieged the scene to scoop the spilt petrol from the scene.

item.title: The US Wants Kashamu Extradition More Than Ever
item.description: Senator-elect Buruji Kashamu should be in jail instead of senatorial seat – that’s what the US officials insist on, having started fresh moves for Kashamu extradition to face drug trafficking charges on American soil. Buruji Kashamu has been evading these charges for several years, but the United States of America didn’t forget about him. Recently the US seeking Kashamu extradition made new moves to get him to the American court. READ ALSO: US Court Decides To Seek Extradition Of Buruji Kashamu

item.description: Canadian actress who became best known for her roles as Nicole Haught in SyFy's Wynonna Earp and Alicia Rutherford in Workin' Moms. Some of her film credits include The Scarehouse, My Ex-Ex and Definition of Fear. Before Fame She trained at the Toronto-located George Brown Classical Theatre School. She has also trained at The Groundlings comedy school. Trivia She has produced several short films. Family Life She married Canadian actor Ray Galletti.  Associated With She starred alongside Mackenzie Mauzy in Girls' Night Out.

item.title: Moghalu Demands Quick Legislation On Diaspora Voting
item.description: A former presidential candidate of the Young Progressive Party (YPP), Prof. Kingsley Moghalu, has demanded quick legislation that would allow Nigerians in Diaspora to vote in the 2023 general elections. In a statement on Thursday, Moghalu urged the National Assembly to speed up legislation that would allow Nigerians in Diaspora to vote and their votes would count. The former Deputy Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) said allowing Nigerians in the diaspora to vote would give them a higher sense of belonging.

item.title: Who Plays Frank Cosgrove's Daughter Lily on Law & Order?
item.description: Who plays Detective Frank Cosgrove's daughter on 'Law & Order'? Alayna Hester made her debut on the series in the three-way crossover premiere. On Thursday, Sept. 22, NBC brought back not one, not two, but all three of the series that make up Dick Wolf’s long-lived procedural drama franchise Law & Order. Promos for the highly anticipated three-way crossover event teased that viewers will be greeted by more than a few familiar faces in the premiere.

item.description: Dereva na utingo kutoka eneo bunge la Gatundu wameyeyusha nyoyo za Wakenya wengi baada ya kujitolea kuyaokoa maisha ya kijana mmoja aliyekuwa ameabiri gari lao Kulingana na mtumiaji mmoja wa mtandao wa Facebook aliyetambulika kama Hon. Mario Nderi, kijana huyo alikuwa na nyanyake wakitoka katika hospitali ya Gatundu Leve 5 ila akazidiwa na ugonjwa akiwa ndani ya gari. Nderi alisema dereva wa gari hilo la Sacco ya GNT, walijitolea na kumkimbiza mtoto huyo katika hospitali ya Neema iliyooko mtaani Kahawa Sukari.

'Poltergeist' Is 40 Years Old Where Is the Cast Now?
item.description: As 'Poltergeist' heads back to theaters for its 40th anniversary, many are growing curious about where the cast is now. Here's what we know. With spooky season around the corner, there's no better time to rewatch one of the best horror films — Poltergeist. Luckily, the movie is headed back to theaters from Sept. 25 to Sept. 28, 2022, to celebrate its 40th anniversary, and you can bet your bottom dollar that we will be there to bask in its supernatural glory on the big screen.

item.title: Almajiri: The plight of Nigerian foot soldiers
item.description: - The almajiri educational system in Nigeria is not economically effective - Some of the Northerners prefer the almajiri educational system to the western style education - The almajiri children have been reportedly abused, exploited, and kidnapped - It is a menace in Northern Nigeria with no solution in sight When Jameel left Kebbi state to go to the busy town of Kano, his plan was to become a mallam. He had learnt the Quran from age eight and at age 17, he left his state.

item.title: Gary Clark Jr. - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Blues guitarist and occasional actor who released the #6 album Blak and Blu in 2012. Before Fame He started playing guitar when he was twelve. Trivia He hsa performed and collaborated with artists like Alicia Keys and the Dave Matthews Band. Family Life He grew up in Austin, where he met the promoter Clifford Antone. He welcomed a son named Zion with Nicole Trunfio in January 2015; the couple later married on April 19, 2016.

item.title: Karen Nyamu Savagely Responds to Fan Who Asked Where Her Baby Bump Disappeared To

item.title: 12 Soldiers Who Attacked GOC Sentenced To Death
item.description: 12 out of the 18 soldiers standing trial for attempted murder and mutiny in Maimalari cantonment, Maiduguri were on Monday found guilty and sentenced to death by a Military court sitting in Abuja, according to Punch. Out of the remaining six soldiers, five were discharged and acquitted while the remaining one was jailed for 28 days with hard labour. It would be recalled it was reported on May 14, that some soldiers, angered by the death of 12 of their colleagues in a Boko Haram ambush, opened fire on the vehicle of  the General Officer Commanding, GOC, 7th Division of the Nigerian Army, Ahmadu Mohammed in Maiduguri.

item.title: Is Michael Phelps Going to Be in the 2021 Olympics?
item.description: Michael Phelps Will Be at the Summer Olympics in Tokyo as a Broadcaster for NBCBy Shannon RaphaelPublished July 21 2021, 11:33 a.m. ET Source: GettyThe most decorated Olympian of all time is set to return to the 2020 Games in Tokyo, but he won't be competing. Michael Phelps, who won 23 gold medals out of 28 overall, will be by the pool again — but not to swim. On July 20, just a few days before the Opening Ceremony (the Olympics is taking place in 2021 due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic), NBC announced that Michael would be part of the broadcasting team for the swimming events.

item.title: Peter Obi Expresses Hope For A Nigeria Where Leaders Have Known Classmate, Certificate
item.description: Labour Party presidential candidate for the 2023 election, Peter Obi has expressed his hope for a Nigeria led by individuals of unquestionable academic credentials and known backgrounds. He voiced his disappointment over the country’s tendency to celebrate individuals with questionable pasts rather than those with notable career achievements. If given the chance to lead, Obi pledges to shift this narrative. The former Governor of Anambra State spoke in Abuja while delivering a keynote address at the graduation ceremony of Pacesetters Academy.

item.title: Private Jet Seized In SA With $9.3mln Might Be Linked To CAN President
item.description: A private jet caught in Johannesburg with around $10 million inside, is the property of Pastor Ayo Oritsejafor, Sahara Reporters provides. According to the report, the head of the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) owns the private plane with US registration number N808HG, which is one of the jets recently seized by the SA officials. The money totaling $9.3 million cash was packed in several suitcases. The cash was seized at the Lanseria airport following the luggage search.

item.title: James Van Der Beek - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actor known best for his breakout role as Dawson Leery on TV's Dawson's Creek. He later played himself on the short-lived ABC series Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23. In 2018, he began starring on FX's Pose.  Before Fame He was a member of an all-male acappella group in high school and at age 15 he wanted to try professional acting so he asked his mother to take him to Las Vegas to get an agent.

item.title: Kelly Clarkson and Reba McEntire: Relationship Details
item.description: Kelly Clarkson and Reba McEntire work together during Season 23 of 'The Voice.' But apparently, the ladies might not be on the friendliest terms. Season 23 of NBC’s The Voice has been a wild one. This latest installment is country singer Blake Shelton's final season as a coach, after having been with the show since its inception. Reba McEntire also joins the cast this season as a mega mentor. She previously appeared in the competition series in 2011 as a battle advisor to Team Blake.

item.title: Alex Iwobi Hopes To Qualify Nigeria For 2023 AFCON
item.description: Super Eagles of Nigeria midfielder, Alex Iwobi hopes to help Nigeria qualify for the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations as they prepare to take on Sierra Leone on Sunday in the penultimate round of the qualification series. With nine points from four games, the Super Eagles have moved down to the second spot in Group A of the qualifiers, one point behind Guinea-Bissau. A victory over the Leone Stars will, however, ensure that the team will play in the 2023 AFCON the following year in the Ivory Coast.

item.title: Couple Says Kids Are Too Expensive and They Won't Have Any
item.description: Couple Says the "Biggest Thing" They Gave up on Because of Finances Is Having KidsBy Chrissy BobicPublished Oct. 17 2023, 1:55 p.m. ET Source: TikTok / @bigaldragThere are plenty of reasons why couples decide not to have children and each one is valid, regardless of what that reason is. For one couple on TikTok, however, it's not about deciding to not have kids on their own accord, but rather a necessity not to have kids because of the economy.

item.title: DJ Cuppy Acknowledges Her Privilege As She Enjoys A Mini Vacation At Her Dads Penthouse In Monaco
item.description: Billionaire’s daughter and female disc jockey,DJ Cuppy, has finally acknowledged her privilege while enjoying a mini-vacation at her dad’s penthouse in Monaco. Naija News understands that the sensational female Dj is currently vacating in Monaco. According toCuppy, via her verified Twitter handle,  acknowledged her father, Femi Otedola for all the privileges she enjoys noting that it was built with his sweat and blood. Cuppy also prayed to give her children the same love and generosity she received.

item.title: Wandani wa DP Ruto Wasema Raila Odinga Ataambulia Patupu Mlima Kenya
item.description: Akizungumza Jumatano, Julai 28 mbunge wa Kiharu Ndindi Nyoro alisema kwamba Raila hana ushawishi Mlima Kenya na kwamba hataungwa mkono na yeyote kutoka eneo hiloNdindi alidokeza kwamba tayari eneo hilo limeamua kuunga mkono azma ya Naibu Rais Willian Ruto ikifika 2022Mwanasiasa huyo pia alidai kwamba kuna njama ya kuunda vyama vingi vya siasa Mlima Kenya ili kuharibu kura wakati wa Uchaguzi MkuuSiku moja baada ya kiongozi wa upinzani Raila Odinga kutembea Murang’a, marafiki wa Naibu Rais William Ruto wamepaka tope hatua ya baadhi ya wanasiasa wa eneo hilo kumpigia debe kuwa rais wa taifa.

item.title: 'Captain America: New World Order': Is the Film's Title Hinting at the Red Skull's Return?
item.description: Sam Wilson's debut MCU film adventure as Captain America is 'Captain America: New World Order.' What is the New World Order in the Marvel Comics? Source: Chuck Zlotnick/Marvel StudiosSam Wilson (Anthony Mackie) made his official debut as Captain America in the finale of The Falcon and the Winter Soldier way back in 2021. An announcement was made shortly thereafter confirming that Sam would return as Cap in Captain America 4. A year later, the official title of Captain America 4 was finally unveiled at San Diego Comic-Con — Captain America: New World Order.

item.description: Here's What's Happening With Jamie and Scott's Relationship on 'FBI: International'By D.M.Published May 23 2023, 9:52 p.m. ET Source: CBSCBS’s FBI: International was an instant hit when it premiered in 2021. The drama series follows a group of agents within the FBI’s International Fly Team, who travel the globe to stop crimes of various degrees. And while the non-stop action of the crime-fighting operatives has surely pleased some fans, others can't seem to get enough of the drama surrounding Jamie Kellett (Heida Reed) and Scott Forrester's (Luke Kleintank relationship.

item.title: Nigeria Kick Against Arrest Of Guinean President Alpha Conde
item.description: The Nigerian Government has condemned the arrest of Guinea President Alpha Conde and the military coup in the West African country. In a statement on Sunday by the spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Esther Sunsuwa, the Federal Government said it was saddened by the development in Guinea. It called on those behind the unconstitutional change of government to restore constitutional order without delay and protect lives and property.

'Bridgerton' Fanatics, We Have Bad News: Reg-Jean Page Might Be Taken
item.description: Emily Brown and Regé-Jean Page were spotted exchanging a firm hug on the snow-covered streets of North London in February 2021. Are they dating? Source: GettyThere's a strong chance that Bridgerton star Regé-Jean Page is taken.  According to outlets like MailOnline, the actor was spotted exchanging a tight hug with writer and part-time soccer player Emily Brown near their shared North London home in February 2021. It's understood that they were saying goodbye to each other before Regé-Jean flew out to New York for a filming assignment.

item.title: Fans Fume Over Tuface's Birthday Message To Annie Idibia
item.description: Legendary Nigerian singer, 2face Idibia has left some fans upset over his birthday message to his wife, Annie Idibia on photo and video sharing app, Instagram. This comes after the singer sent a birthday message ‘devoid of love emoji and sweetness’, according to fans to the actress and mother of two on her birthday today. He wrote: “birthday blessings my Queen. Nothing do u” with a photo of Annie shared on his page.

item.title: Heres Why Audiences Wont See Hannah Berner on Bravos New Series 'Winter House'
item.description: Why isn't reality TV personality Hannah Berner on Bravo's new series 'Winter House'? It's due to the fact that she will not return to 'Summer House.' item.title: Kama kuna 'hustler' wa ukweli ni marehemu Nginyo Kariuki, Raila asema
item.description: Kinara wa chama cha ODM Raila Odinga amemtaja marehemu mwanasiasa Nginyo Kariuki kama mtu mwenye bidii ambaye alijitafutia mali yake bila kutumia udanganyifu Akiomboleza kifo chake wakati wa ibada ya mazishi, Raila alisema anamtambua Nginyo kama 'huster' wa ukweli ambaye anapaswa kuwa mfano kwa vijana wengi. " Nginyo alikuwa kiongozi hodari, jamaa aliyetia bidii maishani na akajitafutia mali kwa njia inayostahili, ukizungumzia kuhusu 'hustler' basi mimi namtambua marehemu Nginyo," Raila alisema.

item.title: 'What Anthony Joshuas Victory Means To Nigeria' Gov Dapo Abiodun
item.description: Governor Dapo Abiodun of Ogun State on Sunday, December 13 said Anthony Oluwafemi Olaseni Joshua, better known as Anthony Joshua’s victory against Kubrat Pulev is a justification for Nigeria’s investment in sports and youth development. The governor stated this after the 31-year-old British professional boxer who has a Nigerian background nocked down Pulev in rounds of boxing fights. According to him, Joshua’s win over Pulev made Ogun State indigenes and Nigerians proud, while restoring hope that despite “the country’s challenges, the nation will overcome.

item.title: US Court Delivers Final Ruling On Hushpuppi
item.description: The United States District Court sitting in the Central District of California has sentenced Ramon Abass popularly known as Hushpuppi to 11 years and three months imprisonment for money laundering conspiracy through several online scams. Naija News reports that Justice Otis Wright II delivered the judgment on Monday, saying the court found Hushpuppi guilty of the allegations including laundering proceeds of a school financing scam, business email compromise and other fraudulent cyber schemes levied against him.

item.title: Nigeria Produces Six Gold Medals In Wrestling At 2024 All-African Games
item.description: It was an unprecedented evening for Nigerian female wrestling contingents at the 2024 All African Games on Sunday night, March 10, as they ended the night with six gold medals in different categories of the event. In the 13th edition of the All African Games, Blessing Oborodudu grabbed the gold medal in the 68kg category after defeating Cameroonian wrestler, Blandine Nyeh Ngiri, 14-4. Afterward, Moroccan wrestler, Zineb Hassoune, suffered a pinfall in the 57KG at the hands of Odunayo Adekuroye who got Nigeria’s second gold medal of the night.

item.title: Why We Suspended Protest Over NDDC Board
item.description: The Ijaw Youth Council (IYC) has revealed its reason for suspending the protest to kick against the absence of a governing board for the Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC). In a statement on Thursday signed by IYC Deputy President and spokesman, Saviour Olali, and Ebilade Ekerefe, the council said the protest was suspended following consultations with critical stakeholders. The statement added that the NDDC offices locked in Bayelsa and Rivers states will be reopened to allow robust dialogue.

item.title: Dillish and Flavour not dating
item.description: BBA 2013 winner Dillish Matthews and Nigerian singer Flavour shared some cozy photos of them together on their instagram pages and this got people insinuating they were dating. Some even said that's why she broke up with her boyfriend, Stephen. Flavour and Dillish became friends after she featured in his 'Ikwokrikwo' video last year which he paid her for. She later broke up with her boyfriend and came for a movie in Port Harcourt.

item.title: Mercy Johnson And Hubby Celebrate 3rd Wedding Anniversary
item.description: One of Nollywood’s finest actress, Mercy Johnson Okojie and her husband Prince Odianosen Okojie are celebrating their wedding anniversary today. Though there were controversies surrounding their marriage, their union still going strong and today, the 27th of August 2014, makes it their 3rd year as a married couple. item.title: Fatal Trailer Accident Claims Four Lives In Bwari Area Council
item.description: At least four people lost their lives in a trailer accident in the Bwari area council of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT). The tragic incident took place at Dutse-Baupma, opposite AYM Shafar Filling Station, along the Dutse-Bwari expressway, around noon on Saturday. The collision, caused by brake failure in a trailer loaded with sharp sand, affected a black Toyota Highlander Jeep, a commercial tricycle, and a black Hilux pickup van owned by the Nigeria Police Force.

item.title: NCC Orders Suspension Of Sale / Registration Of New SIM Cards
item.description: The Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) has directed all telecommunications companies to suspend the registration of new landlines across the federation. The NCC made the announcement in a statement by its director of publicity, Dr. Ikechukwu Adinde, released on Wednesday. The statement said the commission issued the directive in line with the federal government’s policy of reviewing the registry of registrants and ensuring that companies comply with the rules and regulations. It said it was necessary to suspend unregistered phone lines for non-essential activities.

item.title: ThisDay suicide bomber jailed for life.
item.description: The convicted terrorist was alleged to have driven a white Honda Academy car with registration number AL 306 MKA with improvised explosives devices into the premises of SOJ plaza with the intention to detonate improvised explosive devices within the premises. The incident claimed the lives of three persons and caused several degrees of injuries on others. The convict had pleaded not guilty during his trial but the court placed heavy reliance on his recorded interview which he granted to investigators during interrogations where he claimed to be a member of the notorious Boko Haram sect, as well as the testimonies of ten witnesses comprising of police officers who participated in the investigation and were led in evidence during the trial.

item.title: 10 powerful ancient African kings you should know about
item.description: For lovers of history and government, the discussion surrounding African kings is fodder for an interesting conversation. In ancient times, kings established their power by expanding their territories as far as possible. They did this by mainly conquering the weaker cities using whatever means available. Are there any kings in Africa? Yes. Today, three African countries are still governed by kings. These are Swaziland, Morocco, and Lesotho. In the Western part of Nigeria, there are several kings across the region.

item.title: Seven Political Parties To Present One Presidential Candidate Against PDP, APC (Full List)
item.description: At least seven political parties in Nigeria have agreed to work together and possibly present a single presidential candidate for the 2023 general elections in the country. Naija News understands the parties joined forces to unseat both the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and the major opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in 2023. The parties involved are the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP), African Democratic Congress (ADC) Social Democratic Party (SDP) Allied Peoples Movement (APM), People’s Redemption Party (PRP), Labour Party (LP) and National Rescue Movement (NRM).

item.description: Mexican film director whose 2014 feature Birdman earned him the Academy Awards for Best Picture, Best Original Screenplay and Best Director. He also won the Academy Award for Best Director for his 2015 film The Revenant. His other well known films include Babel, 21 Grams and Amores Perros.  Before Fame He spent four years as the host for one of the top radio stations in his hometown of Mexico City, WFM. Then in 1988, he was promoted to director of the station, a position he held for five years.

item.title: Governor Nyong'o urges Safaricom to build cancer centre, name it after Bob Collymore
item.description: Kisumu governor Peter Anyang' Nyong'o has appealed to Safaricom to build a cancer centre in honour of its late CEO Robert (Bob) Collymore who succumbed to leukemia on Monday, July 1. The county chief suggested the oncology centre to be dedicated to Collymore should be set up in one of the leading local universities. READ ALSO: Bob Collymore's wife overwhelmed by condolence messages from Kenyans following hubby's death READ ALSO: Bob Collymore: Fahamu jinsi marehemu alivyojiandaa kabla ya kifo chake kuwadia

item.title: KCSE 2019: 26 candidates arrested in Nairobi over exam cheating
item.description: - The students were arrested at St. Teresa Boys Primary School and 35 mobile phones confiscated - They were among 154 other private candidates sitting their 2019 KCSE examinations at the centre - The students are said to have been receiving exam answers in real time via their mobile phones from unknown sources - Officers administering the exams discovered the students were receiving answers during Chemistry Paper II exams Police in Nairobi on Wednesday, November 6, arrested 26 Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE) candidates believed to have been involved in exams malpractice.

item.title: Photos Of Abducted Major Christopher Datong And His Pregnant Wife
item.description: The photo of a military officer identified as Major Christopher Datong and his pregnant wife, who was abducted on Tuesday when bandit terrorists attacked the Nigerian Defence Academy (NDA) has surfaced online. Naija News earlier reported that Major Christopher Datong, was amongst uniformed men of the NDA that were abducted on Tuesday when bandit terrorists attacked the Nigerian Defence Academy (NDA) in Kaduna. There had been widespread reports that the lifeless body of the Major was discovered on Tuesday evening with insinuations that the terrorists had killed him but fresh reports indicate the officer is still alive.

item.title: Sowore "Reveals' Sponsors Of Thugs Who Attacked Abuja Protesters
item.description: Omoyele Sowore, activist and publisher of Sahara Reporters has implied that officials/operatives under the President Muhammadu Buhari-led administration instigated thugs against the #ENDSARS protesters, in a bid to silence them. Recall NaijaNews earlier reported that Nigerians protesting against police brutality in Abuja under the #EndSARS movement were today attacked by armed thugs. Naija News gathered that the thugs armed with cutlasses invaded the protest venue at Berger junction about an hour after the #EndSARS protesters had convened.

item.title: Masari Says 333 students Are Missing
item.description: The Katsina state government has confirmed that 333 students went missing after gunmen attacked Government Science Secondary Kankara. The governor said a search was underway in the bush to find the students who were thought to have been abducted by gunmen. He made the remarks when the Minister of Defense, General Salihi Magashi, led security chiefs to Katsina State to offer condolences to the governor over the abduction of secondary school students on Friday in Katsina State.

item.title: Watch Emotional Moment Jackie B Reunites With Her Son After Her Eviction From BBNaija
item.description: Evicted Big Brother Naija Shine Ya Eye ex-housemate, Jackie B on Monday reunited with her son and mum hours after leaving the reality show. In an emotional video shared on social media, the mother of one Jackie, screamed as she embrace her 10-year-old son tightly who revealed he flew all the way from Abuja to Lagos to surprise her. Jackie’s B mum was seen hugging and praying for her in the video.

item.title: What Does "Watching Sunsets" Mean on TikTok? Details
item.description: What does watching sunsets mean on TikTok? Creators are sharing how the meaning affects them. Social media users who frequent TikTok know that the app comes with its unique lingo. Over the years, creators on the short-form app have established their own jargon with various acronyms, codes, and phrases. Truth be told, some of the phrasings have been deemed problematic. But for the most part, users follow suit so everyone can communicate effectively.

item.title: ACF Publicity Secretary, Emmanuel Yawe, Is Dead
item.description: The National Publicity Secretary of the Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF), Emmanuel Yawe, has died. According to Tribune, Yawe died today in Abuja after a protracted illness. Staff in the secretariat described him, as a dedicated and professional member of the forum. Naija News reports that the ACF spokesperson died in his sleep on Friday. Yawe’s daughter, Talatu Yawe told Daily Trust that her father had been in and out of hospital in the last few months, but was fine and at home throughout Thursday.

item.title: Cole Hafers - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Most well known for his lmfaoitscole TikTok account where he has over 450,000 fans. He is known for his pop and rap lip syncs on the platform, often utilizing the app's many effects in his videos.  Before Fame He used the Andy Grammer song "Good to be Alive" for his first-ever post on musical.ly, the app which later became TikTok. He played hockey and he began training in MMA at the age of seven.

item.title: Court Rules On Abba Kyaris Bail Request
item.description: The bail application filed by the suspended Deputy Commissioner of Police, Abba Kyari, received a boost on Thursday at the Federal High Court sitting in Abuja. In a ruling on Thursday, the presiding judge, Justice Inyang Ekwo ordered the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) to respond to the request filed by the embattled police officer within 48 hours. Earlier, counsel to the anti-narcotic agency, Mike Kasa, had informed the court that he had not been served with Abba Kyari’s bail request attached to his suit marked FHC/ABJ/CS/182/22.

item.title: NLC Protesters Flood National Assembly
item.description: A group of protesters, guided by the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC), has surrounded the National Assembly Complex in Abuja to express their grievances over the mounting economic hardships and the upward spiral of living costs. Protesters were seen carrying different placards that decried the state of the nation’s economy. Naija News recalls the NLC had declared Tuesday 27th, and Wednesday 28th for nationwide protest to call the government’s attention to the suffering of Nigerians occasioned by the implementation of the fuel subsidy removal policy and floating of the naira.

item.title: Wizkid Reacts To Davido Son's Tragic Death
item.description: International music icon, Ayo Balogun, popularly known as Wizkid has mourned the death of Ifeanyi, the son of his colleague’s son Davido. Naija News reports that the Grammy-award winner took to his Instagram story on Wednesday to post a ‘broken heart emoji’. Recall that Wizkid, also called Wizzy, had deleted his upcoming album promotional tweet on Monday night when the news of the death of Ifeanyi emerged. Wizkid had recently released a new single ‘Money & Love’.

item.title: Put More Effort Into Ending Widespread Insecurity, Don't Wait For State Police
item.description: Labour Party’s presidential candidate at the 2023 general election, Peter Obi, has urged President Bola Tinubu and the 36 state governors to step up their efforts towards swiftly ending the insecurity that has ravaged the country over the past months. Making this call in a post on his official X account, Obi who lamented the rising spate of insecurity, urged President Tinubu and the governors to make every effort to reverse the alarming trend of insecurity while anticipating the introduction of state policing.

item.title: These People Shared The Best Things They Bought Under $100
item.description: People Are Sharing the Best Purchases They Made for Under $100By Mustafa GatollariUpdated Aug. 17 2018, 2:09 p.m. ET Source: instagramBuying the best products doesn't always mean spending the most money, any headphone freak will tell you that.  And, as it turns out, there are tons of relatively cheap products you've probably never thought to buy that'll actually make a huge difference in your daily life. A bunch of people in a recent AskReddit thread shared the best things they purchased for $100 or less, and although some of the finds were lucky deals, it turns out there's a ton of cheap products on this list that'll give you a major quality of life boost.

Netflix's latest food show Is It Cake? is all about making fools of people, in a good way.

Sometimes you just have to open up TikTok. One creator just shared a very brow-raising story about a man who remarried two months after the death of his wife and one of their children.

item.title: Nigerian Newspapers Daily Front Pages Review
item.description: Naija News looks at the top happenings making headlines on the front pages of Nigeria’s national newspapers today Friday, January, 21st 2022. According to The PUNCH, the National Economic Council has said it will take a decision on petroleum subsidy removal in June when the six-month period for subsidy payment in the 2022 budget elapses. Nigerians may need to adjust their expectations ahead of possible removal of subsidy as the rising price of crude oil may push Premium Motor Spirit (PMS), otherwise called petrol, to N403 per litre, The Guardian reports

item.title: The Presidency Is Not A Personal Property Of The Yorubas Afenifere Speaks On Reason For Endorsin
item.description: Yoruba socio-political organization, Afenifere has said that the presidency is not a personal property of the Yorubas. Afenifere stated this while responding to allegations concerning its support for Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate, Peter Obi instead of his All Progressives Congress (APC) counterpart, Bola Ahmed Tinubu. Afenifere’s Secretary-General, Sola Ebiseni, during an interview on Arise TV said that the body’s decision to support Obi was based on the principle and the interest of the Nigerian State.

item.title: Buhari Signs Three Bills Into Law Hours Before End of Tenure
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has assented to the National Assembly Service Pensions Board (Establishment) bill which will administer the pension scheme for personnel of the service. In a statement on Sunday, the Senior Special Adviser to the President on National Assembly Matters, Babajide Omoworare said the bill exempts the personnel of the national assembly service from the contributory pension scheme. The statement added that Buhari also assented to the Federal Road Safety Commission Training Institutions (establishment) bill, for capacity building and training in road traffic administration and safety management.

item.title: Fresh Trouble For Atiku As Obasanjo Slams PDP Delegation, Calls Them Betrayers
item.description: Fresh information has emerged that there might be a problem brewing in the camp of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Naija News gathered that former President Olusegun Obasanjo was reported to have slammed some members of a PDP delegation sent to seek his blessings ahead of the election. Party sources who confided in The Nation said the new development poses a setback for the PDP presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar in the Southwest, where his chances of winning were already slim.

item.title: Meet the Series' Secret Villains
item.description: Meet 'Instant Hotel's Sam and James. Follow them on social media and learn how to book their not-really Byron Beach house. If you're new to Netflix's Instant Hotel, all you really need to know about your new obsession is that it's essentially the Australian homestay version of TLC's Four Dresses. In each of the two rounds on Season 1, five teams of two compete against each other to see who has the best short-term rental, and each episode follows the four teams of contestants as they judge and rate the fifth's house.

item.title: Bwala: It Is Not Easy To Be Surrounded By Straw Men
item.description: The Director of the Abuja School of Social and Political Thoughts, Sam Amadi has said that the the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the 2023 elections, Atiku Abubakar is surrounded by people he described as straw men. Amadi’s statement is coming amidst reports of a chieftain of the PDP, Daniel Bwala visiting President Bola Tinubu. Recall that Bwala, a staunch critic of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) said he was committed to supporting Tinubu’s administration and that he owes no one any apology for his decision.

On July 13, the live feeds showed the Season 24 houseguests gathering for a group mediation; however, one person was missing from the session: Paloma Aguilar. As the day progressed, the 22-year-old interior designer was still missing from the live feeds.

item.title: These Are The Kind Of Leaders We Need Shehu Sani Reacts As Tinubu Calls IPOBs Bluff, Fi
item.description: A former lawmaker, Shehu Sani has praised the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Ahmed Tinubu for scheduling his campaigns in Imo and Anambra State on Mondays. The senator insisted that it takes a daring candidate to fix his campaign rallies on a day when the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, observe a sit-at-home in the region. Sani expressed confidence in the tenacity of Tinubu and the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, adding that the nation needs leaders who can stand up to terrorists, bandits, and separatists.

item.title: Tinubu Storms Owo In Ondo Amid APC Presidential Primaries
item.description: 2023 Presidential aspirant and the National leader of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu, on Monday, stormed Owo in Ondo State to commiserate with victims of the St Francis Catholic Church gunmen attacks. Naija News understands that the Presidential hopeful was in Abuja earlier with other APC stakeholders and presidential aspirant as the party begin its presidential primaries today. Tinubu had earlier reacted to the Owo gruesome killing of innocent Christian worshippers, describing the event as highly reprehensible.

item.title: Bread Records 42%, Rice 48% Price Increases In Five Years NBS
item.description: The National Bureau of Statistics has said the average prices of bread and rice in the country have been recording significant increases in the past five years. Naija News reports that the bureau made this known on Monday in a report that shows the year-on-year analysis of the average prices from January 2017 to January 2022. According to NBS shows data, bread (unsliced, 500g) and rice (agric-sold loose rice) recorded 42 per cent and 48 per cent price hikes, respectively.

item.title: Lagos Deputy Governor Advoctes Life Sentence For Rapist
item.description: The Deputy Governor of Lagos State, Mrs Adejoke Orelope-Adefulire, has called for life imprisonment, without an option of fine, for convicted rapist. She made the call on Monday while speaking at a news conference to celebrate this year’s International Day of the African Child. A day celebrated yearly since 1991, in honour of the over 700 black high school girls that were slaughtered in Soweto, South Africa, in 1976. The deputy governor who expressed optimism that such sentence, would bring about a maximum reduction in rape cases said: “Despite various instruments and laws enacted to protect the rights of the child, we have continued to witness rape cases and other forms of abuse, including sexual harassment, forced marriages, domestic violence, among others.

item.description: Venus is the planetary ruler of the Taurus, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the sign, Saturn lends you a dose of its power as well. item.title: DSS Arrests Ganduje's Media Aide, Tanko-Yakasai After Criticising Buhari, APC
item.description: The media aide to the Governor of Kano State, Abdullahi Ganduje, Salihu Tanko-Yakasai, has been arrested by the Department of State Services. An official of the state government had on Saturday tweeted, “Alhamdulillah we just confirmed @dawisu is at DSS office.” The media aide to Governor Ganduje had called on President Muhammadu Buhari to address the activities of bandits in the country or resign. Tanko-Yakasai stated this on Friday while reacting to the abduction of schoolgirls at Government Girls Secondary School, Jangebe in Talata Mafara Local Government Area of Zamfara State.

item.title: Peter Obi Has The Right To Contest, Power Must Return To The South
item.description: Governor Rotimi Akeredolu of Ondo State has stated that the Presidency of Nigeria must come to the South in 2023 in honour of the unwritten power rotation arrangement in the country. Kuna baadhi ya wanaume ambao hutafuta tu wanawake ambao wameolewa na wala si lolote lingine. Wao hudai kuwa wanawake wengine wa umri wao ni wasumbufufu na mahitaji yao ni mengi kupita kiasi.

Some are wondering whether she has had work done.Regardless of whether she has, Hayden feels more confident than she has in years.

item.title: Vanessa Hudgens Is Married! Let's Explore Her Romantic Journey Through the Years
item.description: Vanessa Hudgens is officially a married woman! As she celebrates this next chapter, let's take a look at her past romantic relationships. Source: Getty ImagesThe Gist: On Dec. 2, 2023, Vanessa Hudgens married Cole Tucker.Cole is a professional baseball shortstop who played for the Pittsburgh Pirates and Colorado Rockies.Before tying the knot with Cole, Vanessa dated Zac Efron and Austin Butler.Everyone loves an on-screen romance that blossoms into reality. This was evident in the late 2000s when Vanessa Hudgens and her High School Musical co-star Zac Efron went from movie love interests to real-life lovers (it was a relationship that probably all fans of the movie shipped).

Before Fame She started modeling when she was sixteen and appeared in numerous TV commercials. Trivia She was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2010. Family Life She has one daughter with her husband, Kyle Lowder, whom she married in 2002. Associated With She starred in Days of Our Lives with Christie Clark.

item.title: Justin Bieber - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Pop sensation who propelled to fame after his 2010 YouTube single "Baby" became an international hit. His first album, My World 2.0, debuted at number one on the U.S. Billboard 200 and went on to sell over five million copies worldwide. Subsequently, his next three studio albums debuted at number one on the U.S. Billboard 200, making him one of the world's best-selling music artists. Before Fame He kept his singing aspirations to himself when he was younger and played chess, soccer, and hockey until uploading a cover of Ne-Yo's "

Ha obtenido gran popularidad en la plataforma por su trabajo como modelo de alta gama, al igual que por sus fotografías de estilo de vida. Antes de la Fama Abrió su cuenta de Instagram en enero del 2016. Curiosidades Su cuenta de Instagram ha crecido, contando con más de 1.7 millones de seguidores.

item.title: Nollywood Actress Zainab Balogun Pampers Herself With House Gift At 33
item.description: Nollywood actress and television presenter, Zainab Balogun-Nwachukwu has bought herself a home as she turned 33 today, October 10. The actress who added a new age via her Instagram post disclosed how she was able to get her home months after she tapped into her bestie’s blessings. Zainab Balogun in a lengthy post narrated how it all happened, adding that God repeats testimonies and does bigger when one celebrates others.

item.title: Trump Supporters Boycott Hawaii
item.description: Trump Supporters Boycott Hawaii, But Their Twitter Campaign Already BackfiredBy Mark PygasUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:25 p.m. ET On Wednesday, March 15, Judge Derrick K. Watson, a federal judge in Hawaii, issued a freeze on President Donald Trump’s executive order. Judge Watson did this just hours before the executive order would have frozen visa issuance and suspended refugee acceptance from six Muslim-majority countries. The order would've been Donald Trump's second attempt at a travel ban, after his first was shot down by another judge.

item.description: After making a remarkable recovery after going into cardiac arrest on the field, Damar Hamlin has made his way back on the Bills' roster. Source: Instagram/@d.ham3Everyone who watches football knows it can be quite risky to bet on who will win or lose — but playing football is even more dangerous. As one of the most hazardous sports to exist, American football and the NFL have faced scrutiny over the years for consistent player injuries.

item.title: Hermes Laments About 'Sapa' Since He Left BBNaiija House
item.description: Former Big Brother Naija ‘Level Up’ Housemate, Hermes Iyele, has taken to social media to lament about ‘sapa’ (a term used in Nigeria to describe a state of being broke). Naija News reports that the reality TV Star in a video shared on his page complained about how things are currently expensive in the country. According to Hermes, since he exited the BBNaija show, commodities have skyrocketed and many Nigerians are aware that prices of goods never come down whenever they increase.

item.title: Nigerian engineer invents power-generating device to end blackout
item.description: - Obayagbona Emmanuel Imafidon revealed that he developed a power-generating device that can end blackout - He said this has been certified by professors from the University of Nigeria - The engineering graduate said he needed the support of the government to fully develop it A Nigerian engineer, Obayagbona Emmanuel Imafidon, has revealed that he has invented a power-generating device that can solve the problem power outage in the country.

item.title: Why Does Bill Belichick Not Appear in Madden? Answered
item.description: For years, Bill Belichick — one of the most recognizable NFL coaches — hasn't appeared virtually in the popular 'Madden' games. Here's the reason why. As head coach of the New England Patriots, you’d think Bill Belichick would be one of the first coaches to appear in the Madden video games. At the helm, his NFL team has had many great seasons; all the while, Bill became a fan-favorite for his coaching and eccentric comments during conferences.

item.title: APC Extends Membership Registration By Three Weeks
item.description: The ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) has extended its membership registration and revalidation exercise by three weeks. Recall that some APC members on Monday stormed the party headquarters to ask for the extension of the exercise which elapsed on Wednesday, March 31, 2021. In a statement on Thursday, Secretary of the APC Caretaker/Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe, said the extension became necessary because of the number of people willing to join the party.

item.title: Gari la serikali ya Kitui laonekana na makaa licha ya marufuku ya Ngilu
item.description: - Gari la Kaunti ya Kitui limeonekana na makaa katika kaunti hiyo - Haya yanajiri licha ya Gavana wa Kitui, Charity Ngilu, kutoa kauli ya kupiga marufuku bidhaa hiyo - Ngilu alitoa kauli ambayo ilielekea kuwahamasisha wananchi kuyateketeza malori yatakayoonekana yakibeba makaa kutoka kaunti hiyo Lori la Kaunti ya Kitui lilionekana Jumapili, Machi 4, lilihusika kwenye ajali eneo la Mwingi, na baadaye kugunduliwa lilikuwa na makaa hii ni baada ya dereva kushindwa kulidhibiti Hata hivyo, TUKO.

item.title: Parental Advisory: 'No Hard Feelings' Actress on the *REAL* Reason the Film Is Rated R (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: 'No Hard Feelings' is rated R and according to actor Laura Benanti, there's a good reason why. Read for Laura's exclusive interview with Distractify! Source: Sony PicturesRaunchy sex comedies are an American staple that had seemingly gone out of style — that was until Sony Pictures’ No Hard Feelings came along. Joining the ranks of films like American Pie, Knocked Up, and 40-Year-Old Virgin is a film starring Jennifer Lawrence as Maddie Barker — an unlucky Uber driver who is hired to bring a well-to-do couple’s teenaged son — Percy — “out of his shell” before he leaves home and starts college.

item.title: See The Salaries And Allowances Of National Assembly Members
item.description: While Nigeria continues to suffer from unpaid workers' salaries, Legit.ng recalls the salaries and allowances of the National Assembly members, according to the report published by the Revenue Mobilisation, Allocation and Fiscal Commission (RMAFC).  According to the RMAFC's estimates, lawmakers’ allowances include accommodation, vehicle loan, furniture and severance gratuity, which are due once in four years. It should be noted that accommodation allowance is paid yearly while furniture, severance and car loan are paid once in four years, the commission said.

item.title: Sergio Aguero Announces Manchester City Exit
item.description: Argentine professional footballer, Sergio Leonel Agüero del Castillo, better known as Kun Sergio Aguero, has penned an emotional farewell statement as he set to exit Manchester City at the end of the summer. Naija News understands that the 32-year-old player had spent over a decade at the Etihad Stadium. Sergio Aguero having achieved and enjoyed the best of his professional career with Pep Guardiola’s side announced in a post on his Twitter account on Monday, March 29, that he will be quitting City at the end of the summer.

item.title: 'NXT' Is the WWE's "Building" League, So What's Finn Balor Doing Back There?
item.description: Finn Balor surprised fans with some time off from the WWE, and when he came back, he appeared on ‘NXT.’ But why is he back? Details! Source: wweIt's a pretty great time to be a pro-wrestling fan. There are some awesome "alternative" organizations that are managing to draw top talent and put on incredible shows, like AEW. But even if you're someone who just sticks to the WWE, then you've got a plethora of programs to watch in addition to Monday Night RAW and SmackDown!

item.title: Get to Know Grace Kellys Three Children, Who Are All Royalty in Monaco
item.description: Where are Grace Kelly’s children now? Learn more about Princess Caroline, Prince Albert II, and Princess Stéphanie and their achievements. Source: Getty ImagesPrince Rainier III, Prince Albert II, Princess Grace, and Princess Caroline, circa 1963 Aside from being an Academy Award-winning actress and the Princess of Monaco, Grace Kelly was also the mother to three children with her husband, Prince Rainier III. And her children reunited in Grace’s honor in 2017, on what would have been Grace’s 88th birthday.

item.title: Gov. Sanwo-Olu Declares 24-Hour Curfew In Lagos State
item.description: Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, has declared a 24-hour curfew in the State starting from 4pm today 20th October 2020. This is coming after Suspected hoodlums disguising as #EndSARS protesters on Tuesday set the Apapa Iganmu Police Station in Lagos State on fire. The governor in a post on Twitter noted that the protest against police brutality has degenerated into a monster that is threatening the well being of our society.

item.title: Mar McCoy - Age, Family, Bio
Alec Guinness - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Distinguished actor who portrayed Obi-Wan Kenobi in the original Star Wars installments. He won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role as Colonel Nicholson in the 1957 film, The Bridge on the River Kwai. Before Fame He worked writing advertising copy in the U.K. In 1934, he made his debut as an extra in Evensong. Trivia Born in London, he had a lucrative Shakespearean acting career before winning an Academy Award for best actor in The Bridge on the River Kwai.

item.title: Gregg Popovich - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Prolific NBA coach of the San Antonio Spurs who led the team to five NBA championships from 1999 to 2014. He won his third NBA Coach of the Year award in 2014. Before Fame He coached the U.S. Air Force Academy and later earned a graduate degree in sports science. Trivia In a 2012 road game against the Miami Heat, he decided to rest four of his starters, which earned him a $250,000 fine from the league.

item.title: Is Mike Tyson OK? The Former Heavyweight Champ Talked About Death Recently
item.description: Boxing legend Mike Tyson has been seen using a wheelchair and walking stick. Here's what we know about his current health state. Source: Getty ImagesWhen it comes to boxing, Mike Tyson is one of the greats. The former heavyweight champion competed from 1985 to 2005 and in that time became a household name. In fact, Hulu just released a miniseries about his life dubbed Mike. Back in 2020, Mike, who holds an impressive record of 50 wins, six losses, and two no contests, teased coming back to fight.

item.title: Register For FGs N75bn Youth Investment Fund Here, See How
item.description: The portal for Nigerians to apply for its N75 billion youth investment fund has been opened by the federal government. The initiative, announced by the Minister of Youth and sport development, Sunday Dare on July 22 took effect today. The initiative – NYIF to the tune of N75 billion is being funded by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). The NYIF is dedicated to investing in the innovative ideas, skills, talents and enterprise of the Nigerian youth with the aim of turning them into entrepreneurs.

item.title: "This Is A Horrible Trend"
item.description: The Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) has condemned the gruesome murder of Hanifa Abubakar, the five-year-old Kano school girl who was kidnapped and murdered by her teacher. The ACF in a statement on Saturday lamented the growing trend of bullying, murder, and kidnappings across schools and educational institutions in the country, noting that such must be curbed immediately. The statement which was signed and released by the forum’s spokesperson, Emmanuel Yawe recalled the case of the 12-year-old Sylvester Oromomi of  Dowen College and rightly noted that the growing anti-social behaviours across schools in the country must be tamed.

item.description: - Gideon Rotich was accused of withdrawing KSh 331,850 from Nicholas Koech's Police Sacco - Rotich used a mobile number registered under his mother's name to effect the withdrawals between July and September 2020 - The mother admitted to the detectives that she had used her national identification details to register the mobile number on his behalf ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter! Ngito Secondary School student has been arraigned over allegations of stealing money from a police officer.

item.description: - In a twist of fate, Lewis Roberts, jerked back to life after doctors concluded that nothing could be done about saving him - The teen’s miraculous awakening happened just as plans were already in motion to donate his organs to seven people in need of them - Lewis' family members were so grateful for having him back as they appreciated people who had shown them much love PAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.

item.title: Nollywood Actor, Tobi Makinde Speaks On Relationship With Funke Akindele
item.description: Nollywood actor, Tobi Makinde, has opened up on his relationship with his senior colleague, cum movie producer, Funke Akindele. Naija News reports that the movie star in an interview with Legit spoke on his remarkable performance as Shina in the trending movie ‘A Tribe Called Judah’. Tobi disclosed that working with Funke over the years has been amazing and also a learning curve for him. He described the ace filmmaker as professional and disciplinarian adding that he wants to be like her because she had made outstanding remarks in the movie industry.

item.title: Saraki's Visit: What Nigerians Are Saying About Atiku
item.description: In a very surprising and controversial manner, Senator Bukola Saraki, emerged the President of the Senate. Few hours after his victory, he paid a courtesy visit to former vice president, Atiku Abubakar, who shared a photo on Twitter. This quickly sparked reactions from Nigerians as some are of the opinion that Atiku was responsible for Saraki’s victory. While some lashed at Atiku for plotting a coup, others supported him. READ ALSO: Senate President Bukola Saraki Must Be Punished – APC

item.title: DR Congo Tops Nigeria In List Of Happiest African Countries (See Others)
item.description: The United Nations (UN) has released the list of the top ten happiest countries in Africa, as contained in the 2023 World Happiness Report. Naija News reports that the World Happiness Report measures national happiness and the data is primarily from the Gallup World Poll based on respondent ratings of their own lives. In Africa, Mauritius emerges as the happiest country on the continent, boasting a happiness score of 5.902. Its extremely happy landscapes and diverse culture undoubtedly contribute to this high ranking.

item.title: Is Hilary Farr Currently Battling an Illness? She's Had Several Surgeries
item.description: Hilary Farr has gone through several surgeries during her tenure as the designer on 'Love It or List It.' Does she currently have an illness? From the drama surrounding what happens to the budget when the inevitable construction issues arise, to the repoire between hosts Hilary Farr and David Visentin (which some have interpreted as sexual tension), it's no surprise that Love It or List It has become one of HGTV's most popular offerings.

item.title: John Goodman Attributes Weight Loss to a Complete Lifestyle Change, Not Surgery
item.description: Did John Goodman undergo surgery to assist with his weight loss? The star maintains his dedication to nutrition and exercise is what did the trick. Source: gettyAddiction manifests itself in many forms: For some people it's nicotine and caffeine, for others it can be "harder" substances like drugs. For me personally, and a lot of other people, food becomes a huge crutch and coping mechanism, and once you start eating, it's hard to stop (at least it is for me).

item.title: Nyota wa injili Bahati Bukuku apigwa marufuku kuingia Congo baada ya kumtapeli askofu KSh100k
item.description: - Bukuku anasemekana kupatiwa kandarasi ya kufanya onyesho katika hafla ya injili kwa KSh 200,000 - Alilipwa KSh 100,000 kama malipo ya utangulizi lakini akakosa kujitokeza siku ya tukio hilo - Askofu aliyempa kandarasi aliripoti suala hilo kwa mamlaka ya Congo na Tanzania - Serikali ya Congo ilimpiga marufuku Bukuku dhidi ya kuingia nchini humo kufuatia suala hilo Mwimbaji nyota wa injili Tanzania Bahati Bukuku amevutia utata baada ya madai ya kumtapeli pasta wa Congo KSh 100,000.

item.title: Waititu alilia mahakama baada ya shida kumwandama
item.description: - Waititu alifika mahakamani na kuomba apewe bondi kwani amefilisika - Sasa aliyekuwa meya wa Nairobi John Ndirangu atamsimamia Waititu badala ya bondi hiyo - Maisha ya Waititu imeonekana kuchukua mkondo mpya tofauti na ilivyokuwa hapo awali Gavana wa Kiambu Ferdinand Waititu ameanza kufilisika na kulazimika kukimbia mahakamani kutafuta fedha alizokuwa ameweka kama bondi kwenye kesi inayomzonga ya wizi wa mali ya umma. Waititu alifika kwenye mahakama Alhamisi, Septemba 19, na kuiomba atafute mdhamini ili kuchukua shilingi milioni 15 alizokuwa ameweka kama bondi.

item.title: DRAMA: 8,000 Job Seekers For 10 Openings In Enugu (PHOTO)
item.description: At least 8,000 job seekers stormed the University of Nigeria Teaching Hospital (UNTH) to interview for the position of administrative officers, on Thursday. The applicants responded to the university’s local advertisement for Administrative Officer II. Interestingly, at least, 5,000, were shortlisted for the interview.  It was not mentioned how many administrative officers the university planned to hire. However, a staff of the university told the journalists that not more than 10 applicants were going to be employed in each category through the process.

item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Halloween star who would reprise her role in the 2018 edition directed by David Gordon Green. She also starred in Prom Night and The Fog. She was nominated for a BAFTA Award and a Golden Globe Award for her role as Wanda Gershwitz in A Fish Called Wanda. In 2015, she was cast as Dean Cathy Munsch on FOX's Scream Queens. Before Fame She was born to Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. She left the University of the Pacific after one semester to pursue a career in acting.

item.title: Kamba MPs issue warning to Nairobi MCAs threatening to impeach Sonko
item.description: - MCAs have threatened to impeach Sonko for not appointing a deputy governor - The city legislators are also annoyed by Sonko for running Nairobi from his home in Machakos - Sonko appointed Miguna Miguna for the position but the embattled lawyer was rejected by MCAs - He fronted four other prospective persons for the position but none of them has been approved for the job Legislators from the Kamba community have warned that a plot by a section of Nairobi MCAs to impeach Governor Mike Sonko was destined for a great failure and disappointment.

item.title: We Didn't Shoot Sowore - Abuja Police
item.description: The Federal Capital Territory, (FCT) Police Command has denied shooting former presidential candidate and Sahara Reporters publisher Omoyele Sowore. The Police in a statement on Monday in which it reacted to earlier reports that Sowore was shot by a security operative during a protest at the Unity Fountain in Abuja said nothing like that happened. It will be recalled that Lawyer, Inibehe Effiong revealed that Sowore was shot on Monday by a female police officer at the Unity Fountain in Abuja.

item.title: Who Is Eli Brown in the 'Gossip Girl' Reboot? The 'PLL' Alum's Role
item.description: The Cast for the 'Gossip Girl' Reboot Has Finally Been Revealed — What We KnowBy Sara BelcherMar. 3 2020, Updated 5:18 p.m. ET Source: CWHBO has been teasing a Gossip Girl reboot that's been in the works for months and, in the first round of spoilers for the show, we finally know who's been cast in it. Set eight years after the events from the original series, which aired from 2007 to 2012, the reboot will air exclusively on HBO's new streaming service, HBO Max, when it's launched.

item.title: Goje Speaks On Attack On His Convoy By Suspected Thugs
item.description: The Senator representing Gombe Central in the National Assembly, Danjuma Goje, has accused Governor Inuwa Yayaha of sending thugs to attack his convoy on Friday. Naija News had reported that some political thugs attacked the Gombe Central Senator as he was about to enter the state capital for a personal engagement on Friday. The spokesman of the lawmaker, Lilian Nworie, accused the state governor of being behind the attack, adding that the attack was led by the governor’s aide-de-camp.

item.description: Reality star on Animal Planet's hit series Pit Bulls and Parolees. She helps her mother Tia Torres run Villalobos Rescue Center in New Orleans, where they rescue dogs. Before Fame As a teen, she traveled the world to assist animal trainers in the film industry and was surrounded by exotic animals from a young age. Trivia She has three dogs of her own, a pit bull named Bluie, a French bulldog and an English bull terrier, which were all rescues from Villalobos.

item.title: Netizens Angry at Sleepy David's Crew for Pranking Omosh: "Making Fun of Him Is Not Ok"

item.title: What Saraki, Obaseki Said About Atiku Emerging PDP Candidate
item.description: Former Senate President and Presidential aspirant, Abubakar Bukola Saraki has congratulated Atiku Abubakar on his emergence as the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). In a statement after the PDP special convention with produced Atiku as the party’s flag bearer, Saraki also thanked his supporters. He said: “I thank all our friends and supporters across the nation for keying into our vision to provide #RealSolutions and #FixNigeria! “I congratulate the winner of tonight’s #PDPPresidentialPrimary, His Excellency, our former Vice-President, Alhaji Atiku Abubakar, on his emergence as the Presidential flag-bearer of our party.

item.title: CBN to Introduce Contactless Payment Guide That Will Turn Phones, Watches into PoS, ATMs
item.description: CBN is preparing to issue guidelines to promote the safe and efficient use of contactless payments in NigeriaGuidelines cover technical and operational requirements, security measures, and standards for the issuance and acceptance of contactless paymentThe move is part of the CBN's effort to modernise the cashless payment policy in the countryThe Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has announced that it will be issuing guidelines for using contactless payment systems in the country.

item.title: Engagement With Candidates Not An Endorsement Or Campaign, CAN Tells Nigerians To Vote Their Conscie
item.description: The Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) has come out to emphasize that its engagements with presidential candidates are not an endorsement or a campaign of any sort. According to the CAN President, Archbishop Daniel Okoh, the interactive session with pre candidates was to discuss issues that will promote the common good of every citizen of Nigeria. Naija News gathered that Okoh, in a statement issued today by the apex Christian body, said the dialogue with the candidates provided a platform for all parties to collectively review the understanding of the crisis of development and governance facing Nigeria and find a lasting solution to them.

item.title: Facts About the Large-Scale Cyber Surveillance Spyware
item.description: It is so efficient that it costs 8 million euros: the Pegasus surveillance software returns to the headlines for spying on 180 journalists and thousands of human rights activists. The news, disseminated by the NGO Forbidden Stories and by Amnesty International and reported by 17 newspapers, is shaking half the world because it also involves politicians and heads of state and, as Edward Snowden has already stated, could represent the biggest violation of privacy by times of Prism, the US electronic surveillance program he unveiled in 2013.

item.title: Kennedy Iyere Emerges Edo Accord Party Governorship Candidate
item.description: Ahead of the forthcoming September 21 Edo gubernatorial election, Comrade Kennedy Iyere has emerged as the candidate of the Accord Party. Naija News gathered that Iyere became the winner of the party’s ticket after five other contestants stepped down for him a day before the primary election. Iyere was then invested as the man to lead the Accord party in the forthcoming governorship election. After he picked the governorship ticket, Iyere immediately picked and confirmed Bright Enabulele as his running mate.

item.title: MIA - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Sri Lankan-British rapper and visual artist best known for her hits "Paper Planes," "Bad Girls," and "Bring the Noize." Before Fame Born Mathangi Arulpragasam, she was always an artist. She published a book of her paintings inspired by the Tamil Rebellion in her native Sri Lanka. item.title: Lawan Discloses Reason APC Will Win 2023 Election

item.description: A segment of the renowned Wuse market in Abuja was engulfed in flames on Tuesday, following a violent protest by enraged youths over the killing of a 17-year-old hawker identified only as Musa. The protest erupted after a distressing incident where a suspect, reportedly being taken to a mobile court within the market for trial, attempted to flee.

The party noted that the decision was reached at the State Working Committee meeting held at the state party secretariat, with a two-third majority of members resolving in a motion that the state chairman, Tony Aziegbemi, should step aside from his position.

item.title: Buhari Tells Nigerians Not To Panic
item.description: Following his return to Abuja from his six days visit to Seoul, the South Korean capital, President Muhammadu Buhari has told Nigerians not to panic over the security alert from the United States (US) and the United Kingdom (UK). According to the President, the U.S. and U.K warnings to their citizens in Nigeria should not destabilise the country because the nation’s security operatives are on top of the situation. Naija News reports that President Buhari, in a statement signed by his Senior Special Assistant on Media and Publicity, Mallam Garba Shehu, urged Nigerians and the various security agencies to be vigilant and security conscious.

item.title: Details Of Bala Mohammed's Meeting With Obasanjo Emerge
item.description: The Governor of Bauchi State, Bala Mohammed on Wednesday visited former Nigeria President, Olusegun Obasanjo at his residence in Abeokuta, Ogun State. Mohammed has intention to contest in the presidential election in 2023 under the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Governor Mohammed arrived Obasanjo’s penthouse residence located within the Olusegun Obasanjo Presidential Library in Abeokuta alongside his aides around 11:30am. The Bauchi state Governor went straight into a closed-door meeting with the elder statesman which lasted for about an hour.

item.title: Buhari Has Not Directed Petroleum Subsidy Removal
item.description: Senate President Ahmad Lawan on Tuesday stated that President Muhammadu Buhari has not given any order on the removal of petroleum subsidy. Recall that the Nigerian Labor Congress, NLC, had earlier directed its members to prepare for a one day strike on January 27, 2022 in response to the planned subsidy removal on petroleum and the imposed tax on soft drinks. Speaking to State House correspondents after a meeting with President Buhari, Lawan said lawmakers were concerned over the different protests and agitation currently rocking the nation which has led to discussions with the president.

item.title: COVID-19 Is Not Our Business In Kogi, I Won't Take The Vaccine
item.description: The Kogi State Governor, Yahaya Bello has insisted that there is no COVID-19 in the state, adding that he won’t take the AstraZeneca/Oxford COVID-19 vaccine. The Governor while speaking on Friday, declared Kogi State has more important issues to deal with than subjecting residents to COVID-19 vaccination. Governor Bello however added that he won’t stop residents who wish to be vaccinated if the federal government makes the vaccine available but personally, he would rather not make the people guinea pigs.

item.title: DHQ Recommends Prosecution Of 500 Boko Haram Suspects
item.description: The Joint Investigation Team set up by the Defence Headquarters (DHQ) has recommended the immediate prosecution of over 500 suspects apprehended in the course of security operations against terrorists. The suspects were apprehended in Yobe, Borno and Adamawa States. This is contained in a statement issued on Wednesday in Abuja and signed by Brig.-Gen. Chris Olukolade, Director of Defence Information. The statement said that the suspects were also among the almost 1,400 detainees screened by the team at the detention facilities in Maiduguri, Yola and Damaturu between July and September.

item.title: Biannca Prince - Age, Family, Bio
FBN Holdings Speaks On Femi Otedola's Acquisition Of First Bank
item.description: Following yesterday’s rife report that billionaire investor, Femi Otedola, has acquired the majority shares of First Bank Nigeria Limited, FBN Holdings Plc has come out to state that it has not received the notification of such acquisitions. Otedola was said to have been acquiring the shares of the bank through a vehicle, Calvados Global Services Limited. It is also likely that there could be other vehicles associated with Otedola who may have also been mopping up shares.

item.title: Peter Obi, Pat Utomi 'Clash' Over Labour Party Presidential Ticket
item.description: A former governor of Anambra State, Peter Obi and a professor of political economy, Pat Utomi will today, Monday, tackle each other for the presidential ticket of the Labour Party (LP). It was gathered that the national convention of the Labour Party will hold today in Asaba, the Delta capital. Recall that Peter Obi had on Friday joined the party after leaving the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). The presidential aspirant had said he joined the Labour Party to take the country from consumption to production.

item.title: Couple Cusses at Kids for "Letting Basketball Roll Into Street" and Social Media Is Outraged
item.description: in a viral video, a couple cusses at kids playing basketball and social media users are disgusted with their behavior. Details here. Source: TikTok/@sober.kellieRespect goes both ways. Growing up, most folks are taught to respect their elders. After all, it’s important to have manners when dealing with people. However, adults should also respect kids. So, when folks see adults being rude and disrespectful to children unprovoked, it becomes a problem very quickly.

item.title: Court Adjourns Nnamdi Kanus N50 Billion Suit Against FG
item.description: The N50 billion lawsuit filed by the embattled leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Mazi Nnamdi Kanu, against the Federal Government has been adjourned by the Federal High Court in Abuja. Naija News understands that the adjournment came after the IPOB leader’s lawyer, Aloy Ejimakor, informed the court that he had filed a notice for a change of counsel. Ejimakor stated that he would be taking over the case from Chief Mike Ozekhome (SAN), who is said to have filed the suit on April 7, 2022.

item.description: What was the biggest tip the cast has received on Bravo's 'Below Deck'? Here are the most notable tips given on the show ranked from best to worst! For nearly a decade, viewers have watched the yacht crews on Bravo’s Below Deck bust their butts to meet the needs of their (sometimes very needy) charter guests. For their hard work, each cast member is paid a salary. In addition, they also get to split the tips.

item.title: Buhari Roasts CNN, BBC Over 'Disgusting' #EndSARS Protest Coverage
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has described as ‘disgusting’ the coverage of the #EndSARS protest by the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) and Cable News Network (CNN) and other foreign media. Speaking at a meeting with state governors at the presidential villa in Abuja on Tuesday, Buhari said the foreign media coverage was not balanced. According to the president, the CNN and BBC deliberately omitted the killing of police officers and attacks on police stations and prisons.

item.title: Gunmen Shoot Dead Imo Monarch, Burn Corpse To Ashes
item.description: Unknown gunmen have reportedly shot dead the Traditional Ruler of Orsu Obodo in Oguta local government area of Imo state. Reports reaching Naija News on Friday morning revealed that HRH Eze Victor Ijioma and the Traditional Prime Minister of Isama of the Mgbele community in the council were both attacked on Thursday evening by unknown assailants. Daily Trust quoted a source claiming that the two traditional leaders were attacked and killed at separate locations yesterday evening.

item.title: Joey Muthengi asema madai kwamba hataki watoto wala kuolewa yalikuwa utani
item.description: - Joey Muthengi akihojiwa awali na Radio Jambo alidai kwamba hataki watoto wala kuolewa - Muthengi sasa amebadili msimamo wake na kusema alikuwa akiwatania tu mashabiki wake - Aidha, mrembo huyo alifichua kwamba amekuwa katika uhusiano tofauti wa kimapenzi lakini haijakuwa ikizaa matunda - Muthengi alikuwa mwendeshaji wa kipindi cha 10 Over 10 kwa miaka kadhaa kabla ya kuondoka Citizen TV Aliyekuwa mtangazaji wa runinga ya Citizen TV Joey Muthegi amefafanua sababu inayomfanya asiwe ameolewa wala kuwa amepata watoto.

That's what makes this show an unmissable watch and why we keep returning.

item.title: Bandits Invade Catholic Seminary In Kaduna, Kidnap Students
item.description: St. Albert The Great Institute of Philosophy, a Catholic-run seminary located in the Fayit community in Kagoma Chiefdom in the Jama’a Local Government Area of Kaduna State, has been attacked by gunmen suspected to be bandits terrorists. According to reports, the bandit terrorists invaded the seminary on Monday night. The terrorists stormed the school at about 8 pm and began shooting sporadically, causing everyone to run to safety. A source that spoke with NewsWire on the incident said the attack lasted for more than an hour before local hunters and vigilantes intervened and “chased the terrorists away.

item.title: Did Marilyn Monroe Have Plastic Surgery? Unanswered in 'Blonde'
item.description: Did Marilyn Monroe have plastic surgery? Marilyn is the subject of the Netflix docuseries 'Blonde.' Here's what we know about her cosmetic surgeries. Article continues below advertisement Netflix’s Blonde documents the life and times of the late bombshell. But there were a couple of questions left unanswered. All of us can agree that Marilyn was — and will always be — a timeless beauty. But did she have plastic surgery? Here’s what we know.

item.title: Joho akutana na mwenzake wa MIGORI siku moja baada ya kuponea chupu chupu (picha)
item.description: - Mkutano uliokuwa umehudhuriwa na Gavana wa Mombasa Hassan Joho Migori uligeuka na kuwa uwanja wa vita Jumatatu Aprili 3 - Risasi zilifyatuliwa, ambapo Gavana Okoth Obado alihusishwa na mgogoro huo - Siku moja baadaye, magavana hao wawili wanasemekana kukutana Habari Nyingine: Bei ya UNGA yatarajiwa kuteremka kuanzia wiki ijayo Gavana wa Migori Okoth Obado anasemekana kukutana na Gavana Hassan Joho wa Mombasa, siku moja baada ya vurugu kutokea wakati wa mkutano wa kisiasa Migori Jumtatu, Aprili 3.

item.title: BBNaija: 'I Dont Think When Im Angry'
item.description: Big Brother Naija ‘All-Stars’ housemate, Seyi Awolowo, has apologized over a recent statement on training his son to ‘run trains’ on people’s daughters. Naija News recalls that Seyi, during a conversation with Whitemoney, Pere and Cross after last week’s Saturday night party, claimed he had opened a miscellaneous account for his son to enable him to have s3x with people’s daughters. The disgusting comment generated controversy on social media, and the Lagos State Government also condemned it.

item.title: Check Out Pictures From Olusegun Obasanjo's Son's Wedding
item.description: Nigeria's former president, Olusegun Obasanjo celebrated with his son, Bisoye Obasanjo last week as he got married to his fiancee, Chigozie Nwenyi on 30th of Nov. 2013. The wedding took place at the Chapel of Christ The Glorious King, located inside the Olusegun Obasanjo Presidential Library Complex in Abeokuta. Current president Goodluck Jonathan reportedly could not attend the event but sent the FCT Minister to represent him. Other dignitaries in attendance were : Ibrahim Babangida, David Mark Governor Ibikunle Amosun, Chief Tony Anenih, serving Ministers, Top Government officials, Former Governors, Royal fathers and other society VIPs.
